overview: Hunky Euro stud Lucio Maverick bottoms for the very first time in his career during Michael Lucas' third sex-crazed trip to the Hungarian capital! Michael himself pumps Lucio's virgin ass in every position (including Michael's now-trademark helicopter spin) and brings the camera deep inside Lucio's gaping, yearning hole. The juicy jizz also flies when Lucio hooks up with hottie Buck Munroe.
title: Cruising Budapest 3: Lucio Maverick
